mobile_bartending_services.name: Drink Slingers
mobile_bartending_services.about: Northeast Ohio's premier bartending service providing professional bartenders for all occasions. They carry $1,000,000 in liquor liability insurance and aim to make the entire process from planning to event clean-up as easy as possible for the client.

client_reviews.review: Kenny was amazing! He was prompt and brought a mobile bar as my venue didn't have one. He even was willing to stay an extra hour when we didn't want the fun to stop! Polite and professional - I will definitely be using their services again in the future!

We hired Kenny from Drink Slingers to work our wedding. He was amazing. When he called us the week before to go over details, we had no idea how much alcohol or mixers we would need for the event. He talked us through it and told us exactly how much of each type of liquor and mixers we would need. When it came time for the wedding, he was there early to set up, and our guests were very pleased with his knowledge and professionalism. Thanks for being part of our special day and making there be one less thing for this bride to worry about!

Our venue recommended a bartending service that was way out of our budget, so I turned to Thumbtack to find someone more affordable. I connected with Drink Slingers who was offering the exact same service for half the price. They were responsive in their initial communication, contacted me before my wedding to make sure everything was in order and then I didn't have to worry about a thing from there. I even completely forgot to set aside their payment and they were extremely understanding at the end of the night when I had to Venmo them instead. I would highly recommend Drink Slingers for your wedding or any event!

These guys did a great job overall. I received many compliments about them for quick service, good drinks, and very personable. My only issue was they showed up 10 minutes before the start of my daughter's wedding. We had agreed on 2:30 and I agreed to pay them for 2 extra hours, but they didn't get there until 3:20. That was a little stress that I didn't need at that moment!

Kenny was a great bartender. He set up the bar beautifully and monitored supplies all night. He arrived early to make sure that we had a ready-to-go bar upon our guests' arrival. He was also super friendly with the little kids there!

Kenny rocked the show! He bartended our event without a hitch; smooth running machine! Kenny's prices are reasonable and realistic, but his service is exceptional! He was very thorough on our several calls, and also helped with recommendations on what alcohols I should buy and the quantity. I could not have chosen a better person and company for my event. Thank you, Kenny, for being another one of my top-notch vendors!!

Super accommodating. Very friendly and professional. Even let me pay for an extra hour that wasn't scheduled. Everyone was having a blast and I didn't want to kick them out. Great value on great service.

Kenny was hired to service a 50th birthday party on 1/11 - the weather turned terrible, he still made it to my event at the time he stated and took care of my guest well. I would suggest anyone who wants a Great Bartender to hire him - hands down. He cleaned up behind himself and boxed up the beverages that were left over. I cannot say enough about his services.

Kenny and his team are 100% flawless. He was such a help multiple times before my wedding, and was super cool and everyone loved him and his other bartender that he brought. I would absolutely recommend him to everyone and would hire him again in a heartbeat. Thank you so much Drink Slingers!!

The bartender was fantastic in terms of how he interacted with our guests I loved him! The company itself was very responsive and professional. The only complaint I had was that we had a limited amount of alcohol and he made the drinks very strong at first. We became low on liquor fast. I wouldn't have minded but we only had to mixed drinks in terms of bar service so we only bought six bottles of liquor of each. Just something to discuss with the bartender before the wedding starts or have the day of coordinator discuss is all I'm not upset in the slightest I had a great day and I didn't have to worry about it
They were great, made for a food night for everyone. Recommend Drink Slingers for any event. Will use them again in a heartbeat

While I never actually made it up to the bar myself, countless wedding guests came up to me to say how great the bartenders were! They were so efficient that I never once saw a line at the bar in over 6 hours!! They were personable, knowledgeable, and fast.. I couldn’t have made a better choice. Kenny called the week of to finalize details.. I didn’t have to worry about calling him first. They arrived an hour early to set up and even cut our fruit for garnishes! Don’t choose anyone else.. you won’t regret hiring Kenny and his staff!

We could not have been happier with our choice of bartending services for our wedding at Happy Days Lodge. Kenny and his staff were super polite and accommodating to us and all of our guests. We did run out of liquor halfway through the reception... however, we gave Kenny extra cash before the wedding to grab more if needed (which he did), and everything was fine! Kenny was a pleasure to work with and made us feel super comfortable throughout the entire planning process!

We hired Drink Slingers for our casual wedding Reception. Kenny was extremely professional- he responded quickly to my emails/texts & helped me plan our party. Matt was our bartender, he arrived on time, set up his work area quickly & handled our party effortlessly. I can’t say enough good things about Drink Slingers!! Do not hesitate to hire their services for your event!

Kenny and Drink Slingers were wonderful to work with! Kenny was available to answer any questions I had, and was very knowledgeable on how much alcohol I would need for my event. They kept the party going, and handled any problems that came their way. We had an emergency venue change 5 days before our wedding, and Kenny didn't even blink an eye; he just accommodated to what we needed.

mobile_bartending_services.name: The Thirsty Filly
mobile_bartending_services.description: The Thirsty Filly is Northeast Ohio’s premier mobile bartending service. They have converted vintage horse trailers into a bartending hotspot with rustic charm and wooden surfaces. They aim to provide rustic cocktail creations for events, weddings, birthdays, and celebrations.
